page.title: 05LIVING IN A VILLAGE
page.content: I LIKE LIVING IN ST ABBS BECAUSE YOU CAN WATCH THE BIRDS NESTING ON THE CLIFFS AND THE BOATS COMING IN AND OUT . AT WEEKENDS I GO OUT ON MY PAPA'S BOAT AND HAUL THE CRIBS . I SOMETIMES GO OUT ON SUNDAY WITH THE ANGLERS . IN SUMMER I GO SWIMMING FROM THE SLIP AND PADDLE MY RUBBER DINGHY ROUND THE HARBOUR. I LIKE GOING ROUND THE HEAD JUST TO LOOK FOR BIRD'S EGGS BUT NOT TO TOUCH THEM .YOU CAN FIND DIFFERENT KINDS OF ROCKS AND EVEN SKULLS OF SHEEP , RABBITS OR OTHER SMALL CREATURES IF YOU ARE LUCKY. I ALSO LIKE TO GO TO THE FARM TO HELP CLEAN OUT THE CATTLE , STACK THE BALES OR GO ON THE TRACTOR WITH THE PLOUGH. IF THE WEATHER IS GOOD WE GO TO THE BEACH TO SWIM OR JUST PLAY ON THE SAND . ON THE LAST DAY OF TERM THE SCHOOL HAD A "SAUSAGE SIZZLE" ON THE BEACH . IT WAS GREAT FUN COLLECTING STICKS .
